overview: Monroe is an arrogant and resourceful little boy, looking for a perfect friend. In his loneliness, he finds Manta, an imaginary friend, but soon after, Monroe forgets him. Affected by it, Manta leaves and wanders the world looking for the meaning of love, something that, although not perfect, has always been by his side.

production_companies.name: Universidad de Los Andes, Facultad de Humanidades y Educación - Escuela de Medios Audiovisuales

title: Monroe
